name: 萨曼莎·桑顿-赖斯
name_full: 萨曼莎·桑顿-赖斯 Samantha Thornton-Rice
introduction: Samantha Thornton-Rice is from from Sussex, England. Samantha is both a stage and screen actor - with plenty of experience in touring theatre, especially around Europe. A Christmas Carol, Crooked Letter Crooked Letter and Pygmalion remain her strongest touring theatre credits to date. The film Soul Reaper (2018), where she plays 'Poppy' is available on Netflix.
